attributes.background: Ban all fireworks apart from noiseless from public sale. Too many people are waking up to find their beloved pets deceased from the incessant booms and screeches fireworks producers seem to deem necessary in their products.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions which call for similar actions:

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354

Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639319
